text: Ke kaloku baza kuvela bonke phambi koAllâh (ngoMhla wokuGqibela); baze abo babengenamandla bathi kwabo babekhukhumele (abangabalawuli): “Inene thina sasilandela nina; ingaba ningasinceda nokuba kungantoni na ngo- kuchasene nesohlwayo sika-Allâh?” Baza kuthi bona: “Ukuba uAllâh Wayesikhokele thina, ngesasinikhokele nani. Akuyi kubakho mahluko kuthi (ngoku) nokuba singabhabhazela (ngumsindo) okanye sinyamezele (isohlwayo) ngomonde; akukho ndawo esinokuzifihla kuyo.”
